description:
This course could be useful for anyone who wants to install Oracle E-Business Suite in a Oracle Virtualbox VM on their Laptops or Desktops, for their personal learning.

It will be useful to anyone who have not installed Oracle E-Business Suite previously, or people having some exposure to Oracle technologies but want to learn Oracle E-Business Suite.

We will be using the following environment for installation:

+ Host Machine (Operating System) = Windows 7

+ Guest Virtual Machine (Operating System) = Oracle Linux 5.7

+ VM Platform = Oracle Virtualbox

+ Oracle E-Business Suite Release = First install Release 12.2.0 and then upgrade to Release 12.2.4

+ Both Database Node and Application Node will be installed using two linux users, but within one server hardware
title: Introduction to Oracle Applications DBA
